page.title: 10Settlements-Grayshott
page.content: In{Grayshott}most of the houses are detached but there are some bungalows and a very small number are semi- detached. Most of them have 4 bedrooms. The houses are between 10 and 30 years old. The most popular fuels are gas and electricity and only a very small number use oil. The majority of people have large gardens and many people have a double garage but most still have a single garages. Within the home the vast majority have both a telephone and a colour television. Many have bicycles and video recorders but only a few have either a swimming pool or boats and none have stables. Most people are in full time employment, though a few have retired.{London-bound}commuters using the station at{Haslemere} numbered at least a third of those interviewed.
